Jadi Dirut Bulog, Buwas Paling Takut Dimarahi Ibu-ibu
01 Nov 2019, 06:35 by Eko Wahyudi, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Direktur Utama Perum Bulog Budi Waseso yang biasa disapa Buwas akhirnya buka rahasia dengan membeberkan perasaannya saat pertama kali ditunjuk Presiden Jokowi sebagai orang nomor satu di perseroan yang khusus menangani pangan. Buwas mengatakan sempat ragu menerima tanggung jawab yang dinilainya berat, karena berhubungan langsung dengan perut jutaan orang.
"Di kala saya mendapatkan ini sebenarnya saya ragu. Karena di luar kemampuan saya. Tapi karena saya berangkat dari seorang abdi negara maka saya pemikirannya adalah pengabdian, dan harus nothing to lose, serta ikhlas," kata Buwas di acara Ngopi BUMN, di Kementerian BUMN, Jakarta, Jumat, 1 November 2019.
Dia juga mengutarakan, bahwa apa yang dilakukan saat ini juga sangat krusial, karena apabila Bulog gagal dalam menjalankan mandat sebagai penjaga ketahanan pangan maka dirinya harus berhadapan dengan ibu-ibu. "Kalau beras enggak ada yang gelisah siapa? Ibu-ibu. Kalau berasnya jelek yang marah siapa? Ibu-ibu. Kalau berasnya mahal siapa yang marah-marah? Ibu-ibu. Dan Bulog sebagai penyuplai beras bisa dimarahin nanti," tutur Buwas.
Walaupun semula menjabat Kepala Badan Narkotika Nasional (BNN) yang jauh dari urusan pangan, Buwas berkomitmen menjalani amanah sebagai Dirut Bulog. Sebab ia menilai, urusan Bulog juga berkaitan dengan upaya membangun generasi bangsa yang lebih sehat dan cerdas.
"Dulu mencegah generasi bangsa agar tidak rusak, sekarang menangani bagaimana generasi bangsa sehat. Sesuai program Pak Presiden SDM (sumber daya manusia) unggul, sumbernya dari pangan yang terjamin," ujar Budi Waseso.

So the Managing Director of Bulog, the Most Fearful of Being Scolded by Mothers
01 Nov 2019, 06:35 by Eko Wahyudi, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Bulog President Director Budi Waseso who is usually called Buwas finally revealed his secret by revealing his feelings when he was first appointed by President Jokowi as the number one person in the company that specializes in handling food. Buwas said he was hesitant to accept the responsibility that he considered heavy, because it deals directly with the stomachs of millions of people.
"When I got this, I was actually in doubt. Because it was beyond my ability. But because I departed from a servant of the state, my thoughts were devotion, and I had nothing to lose, as well as sincerity," Buwas said at the BUMN Coffee Event, at the BUMN Ministry. , Jakarta, Friday, November 1 2019.
He also stated that what is being done at this time is also very crucial, because if Bulog fails to carry out its mandate as a guardian of food security, he must face women. "If there is no one who is nervous about rice? Ladies. If the rice is ugly, who is angry? Ladies. If the rice is expensive, who is angry? Ladies. And Bulog as the supplier of rice can be scolded later," said Buwas.
Although initially he was the Head of the National Narcotics Agency (BNN) which was far from food affairs, Buwas was committed to undergo the mandate as Managing Director of Bulog. Because he considered, Bulog's affairs were also related to efforts to build a healthier and smarter generation of the nation.
"Previously it prevented the nation's generation from being damaged, now it handles how the nation's generation is healthy. In accordance with the President's program the superior human resources are sourced from guaranteed food," said Budi Waseso.
